title: The Sadist (restored, colorized) (1963, horror, imdb score: 6.7)

sources.title: The Sadist (restored, colorized) (1963, horror, imdb score: 6.7)
sources.description: The Sadist (also known as Profile of Terror and Sweet Baby Charlie) is a 1963 American exploitation film written and directed by James Landis, and stars Arch Hall, Jr. The film was distributed by Fairway International Pictures of the United States and Prima Film of Canada.
